description.zh-CN: 系统管理控制器模拟，提供硬件监控和系统稳定性
description.zh-TW: 系統管理控制器模擬，提供硬體監控和系統穩定性
description.zh-HK: 系統管理控制器模擬，提供硬體監控和系統穩定性
description.ja: Emulates the システム Management Controller (SMC) for ハードウェア monitoring and システム stability.
description.ko: Emulates the 시스템 Management Controller (SMC) for 하드웨어 monitoring and 시스템 stability.
description.es: Emulates the sistema Management Controller (SMC) for hardware monitoring and sistema stability.
description.fr: Emulates the système Management Controller (SMC) for matériel monitoring and système stability.
description.de: Emulates the System Management Controller (SMC) for Hardware monitoring and System stability.
description.ru: Emulates the система Management Controller (SMC) for аппаратное обеспечение monitoring and система stability.
description.en: Emulates the System Management Controller (SMC) for hardware monitoring and system stability.

version.changelog:
#### v1.3.7
- Added constants for macOS 26 support

notes.en: A modern SMC implementation that replaces FakeSMC.
notes.ko: A modern SMC implementation that replaces FakeSMC.
notes.es: A modern SMC implementation that replaces FakeSMC.
notes.fr: A modern SMC implementation that replaces FakeSMC.
